alert.note: Alert for Dixie; Jefferson; Lafayette; Madison; Taylor (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued April 27 at 7:08PM EDT until April 27 at 9:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 174 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 9 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 5 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA DIXIE JEFFERSON LAFAYETTE MADISON TAYLOR IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BERRIEN BROOKS COLQUITT COOK LANIER LOWNDES THOMAS THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ADAMS BEACH, ADEL, ALMA, ATHENA, BANNOCKBURN, BARNEYVILLE, BERRIEN CO A/P, BLUE SPRINGS, BLUE SPRINGS, BOYD, BROOKS CO A/P, BUCELL JUNCTION, BUCKVILLE, CABBAGE GROVE, CAPPS, CARBUR, CASA BLANCO, CHERRY LAKE, COOK CO A/P, COOKS HAMMOCK, COTTLE, COURTHOUSE, CROSS CITY, CROSS CITY AIRPORT, DAY, DILLON, DILLS, DIXIE, DRIFTON, EMPRESS, FESTUS, GREGGS, GROOVERVILLE, HANSON, HINES, HOPEWELL, JARROTT, JONESBORO, LACONTE, LAKELAND, LOVETT, MADISON, MASSEE, MAYO, METCALF, MIDWAY, MONTICELLO, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NANKIN, NASHVILLE, OLD TOWN, PASCO, PERRY, PINE VALLEY, PINETTA, QUITMAN, SPENCE AIRPORT, TEETERVILLE, THOMASVILLE, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WEBER, AND YELLOW JACKET.
